int sceIoChstat (  const char *  file,
SceIoStat *  stat,
int  bits
) 
 

Change the status of a file.

Parameters:
file - The path to the file.
stat - A pointer to a SceIoStat structure.
bits - Bitmask defining which bits to change.
Returns:
< 0 on error.
